verbose_text: Ginsenosides have increased adrenal cAMP in intact, but not in hypophysectomized, rats, and dexamethasone (which provides positive feedback at the level of the pituitary gland) has blocked the effects of ginsenosides on pituitary corticotropin and adrenal corticosterone secretion (Li, 1987).
evidence: dexamethasone (which provides positive feedback at the level of the pituitary gland) has blocked the effects of ginsenosides on pituitary corticotropin
